attributes.action: take immediate action to resolve overdue EEA2 consideration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Refer to the provision of the article 10 of the 2004/38 directive and 1.9 Six-month rule "Community law requires us to decide applications for a residence card within 6 months from the date of receipt of the application. Failure to comply with this requirement could leave the Home Office open to a claim for damages.", the EEA2 applications have been submitted for up to 8 months have not yet been allocated to a caseworker.

This is breaching human right and EU legislation.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
